description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. RoomRental is a strategic puzzle game. It's based om the papergame "dots and boxes". Are you ready to test your strategic skills? Keep your eyes open and play your walls right.   Challenge your friends to play together.
